title: Oubliette
description: Rising prison costs have led to a change in inmate set adrift in space with no hope of return.Ray had been out so long that he had given up all hope, completely resigning himself to his fate, when a passing ship picked him up, forever changing the course of history.Oubliette is an Epic, Sci-Fi Fantasy Short Story about alien first contact, and a futuristic political commentary about a dystopian future and the nature of human weakness.Here's What's Early Readers have been "Absolutely amazing. Its a clever, thought-provoking work of art that will leave you thinking long after you finish reading.""I really liked it. An insightful comment on the very fabric of our society, our social norms and our political systems."
author: Jeremy Marinoff
